name: Good Hope
text:
This spell instills powerful hope in the subjects. Each affected creature gains a +2 morale bonus on saving throws, attack rolls, ability checks, skill checks, and weapon damage rolls.

Good hope counters and dispels crushing despair.
target_zh: 每等级一个活物，任意两者之间的距离不超过30尺
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效 (无害)
text_zh:
这个法术给受术者持续灌输以强有力的希望。每个受影响生物的豁免检定，攻击检定，属性检定，技能检定以及武器伤害检定均会获得+2士气加值。

强大希望反制和解除‘极度绝望 (crushing despair)’。
